Name: Rosalina's Storybook
Notes:
The storybook which Rosalina reads in the Library at the Comet Observatory as the player progresses through the game (SMG1).

Extra notes: This is not the object you're looking for if you want to edit the actual story told by Rosalina, whether it be the text or the images, it doesn't contain either of those, it's just a prop.
